## 3. (Optionally) float it like a real chat bubble

If you‚Äôd rather have a little circle in the corner that pops open (√† la ChatGPT), drop the **CSS + JS** sample below instead of the single `<gradio-app>` tag.  
It‚Äôs the official snippet from Gradio‚Äôs ‚ÄúWebsite Chat Widget‚Äù guide, already wired to your Space. [oai_citation:2‚Ä°gradio.app](https://www.gradio.app/guides/creating-a-website-widget-from-a-gradio-chatbot)

<div id="chat-widget" class="chat-widget">

<style>
/* miniature style sheet ‚Äî tweak colours to match Blue Origin blues üöÄ */
.chat-widget{position:fixed;bottom:20px;right:20px;z-index:1000}
.chat-toggle{width:50px;height:50px;border-radius:50%;background:#007bff;border:none;color:#fff;font-size:24px;cursor:pointer}
.chat-container{position:fixed;bottom:80px;right:20px;width:340px;height:500px;background:#fff;border-radius:10px;box-shadow:0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,.1);display:flex;flex-direction:column}

</style>

<script>

</script>
